description: Enables a VPC to support DNS hostname resolution for ClassicLink. If enabled, the DNS hostname of a linked EC2-Classic instance resolves to its private IP address when addressed from an instance in the VPC to which it's linked. Similarly, the DNS hostname of an instance in a VPC resolves to its private IP address when addressed from a linked EC2-Classic instance. You must specify a VPC ID in the request.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Returns true if the request succeeds; otherwise, it returns an error.
